caption:
In the weeks leading up to the Paris Olympic trials, British rower @george.bourne was challenged by a COVID-19 diagnosis that raised heart health concerns. Following cardiac issues among some teammates, he consulted Dr. Sanjay Sharma, a top sports cardiologist in the UK.

Dr. Sharma, who has been working with athletes since 1997, specializes in identifying normal heart adaptations versus potential disease. After conducting stress echocardiography with GE HealthCare’s cardiovascular ultrasound, he confirmed that George’s heart was fit for rigorous training.

Now cleared, George is eager to continue his rowing journey. 💜

Read more at our link in bio.

#SportsMedicine #HeartHealth #GEHealthCare
